record.title: MEASURE PLACED ON THE CALENDAR--H.R. 3352
record.narrative:
MEASURE PLACED ON THE CALENDAR--H.R. 3352 -- (Senate - April 14, 2008)

[Page: S2981]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that H.R. 3352 be discharged from the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources and be placed on the calendar.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
